DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether topical capsaicin patch effectively reduce chronic neck pain .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Topical Capsaicin Chronic Neck Pain
DOC.detailed_description: - Design : This double-blind , randomize , control study . Participants : Sixty participant chronic neck pain recruit randomly assign two group . - Intervention : Over four-week period , treatment group ( n=30 ) use capsaicin patch ( 100 mcg/3cc ) tender point neck 12 hour day ; control group ( n=30 ) receive Hydrogel patch instead capsaicin patch .
